name: Buddha's Classic
description: True enlightenment is but a sip away with this classic bubble tea. Black tea is shaken together with frothy milk and crushed ice poured over scrumptious caramelized tapioca pearls.

name: Cheesey Bliss
description: Experience Cheese Nirvana. This delicious beverage is crowned with a tangy cheese cream.

name: Light of the Lychee
description: Lose yourself in the delicate sweetness of fresh lychee.

name: Watermelon Splash
description: Refresh your body and mind with a hit of watermelon.

name: Jasmine Milk Pearl
description: A firm favourite. Experience the heady scent and taste of jasmine bathed in milk.

name: Taro Milk Pearl
description: Take time to savour the unique flavour of taro.

name: Rainbow Lotus
description: A colourful fruity mix will help guide you on your path to enlightenment.
